notes: Section 7 requires Cyber Security Management System (CSMS) with documented policies
Section 7.2.2.2 requires defined organizational roles for cybersecurity
Section 7 CSMS covers vehicle development lifecycle, Annex 5 lists threats to mitigate
Section 7.2.2.3 requires managing cybersecurity risks from suppliers and service providers

control_name: Addressing information security within supplier agreements
notes: Section 7.2.2.3 requires supplier contracts to address cybersecurity requirements
Annex 5 includes availability threats; CSMS must address operational continuity

control_name: Legal, statutory, regulatory and contractual requirements
notes: Section 1 scope, Section 5 type approval requirements for vehicle cybersecurity

control_name: Information security awareness, education and training
notes: Section 7.2.2.2 implies competent personnel for CSMS implementation
Section 7.2.2.4 requires monitoring, detecting and responding to cyber attacks
Section 7.2.2.5 requires identification and remediation of vulnerabilities
Section 7 CSMS includes secure configuration management for vehicle systems
Section 7.2.2.4 requires monitoring and detection of cyber threats
Annex 5 Part A.3.1 lists cryptographic controls as mitigations for threats
Section 7.2.2.2 requires cybersecurity in vehicle type development process
Annex 5 defines security requirements for vehicle software and communications

control_name: Security testing in development and acceptance
notes: Section 7.2.2.2 requires testing and validation of cybersecurity measures
